hero.description: I'm a full-stack developer from Brazil transforming ideas into fluid websites and apps.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Full‑stack developer
about.description: I'm a full‑stack developer focused on building fast, fluid web experiences with React, Node.js, and modern technologies. I love combining design and engineering to deliver clear, well‑documented products that are easy to evolve.

priorities.title: I prioritize
priorities.flexibility: I'm very flexible with time zone communications

experience.title: My work experience
experience.subtitle: Building impactful solutions at leading companies

pichau.description: Front-end Developer at Pichau, one of Brazil's largest e-commerce platforms for gaming computers and hardware. Working on high-performance, scalable solutions that serve millions of users.
pichau.highlight1: Developed and maintained user-facing features using modern frontend technologies
pichau.highlight2: Optimized performance and user experience for high-traffic e-commerce platform
pichau.highlight3: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions

totvs.description: Back-end Developer at TOTVS SC (Santa Catarina), a branch of TOTVS SA, Latin America's largest technology company. Developed robust enterprise solutions and APIs for business management systems.
totvs.highlight1: Designed and developed scalable backend systems and RESTful APIs
totvs.highlight2: Implemented database solutions and optimized query performance
totvs.highlight3: Worked with enterprise-grade technologies and best practices
